title: Летучий отряд
overview: They are called "Flying Squad". They report directly to the Economic Counterintelligence Directorate. They are the best people in their profession! The glorious five: the head of the group - Lieutenant Colonel Kirsanov, Senior Lieutenant Grushin, Major Artemyev, the beautiful investigator Kalugina and Captain Tarasyuk. "Flying Squad" is entrusted with a task of special importance: to ensure the security of the state border, catch criminals and punish werewolves in uniform.
